ing: 2 tablespoons aged balsamic vinegar, or to taste
2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or to taste
n: Arugula and Strawberry Salad with Feta Cheese
des: "Very easy salad to throw together and the taste is so refreshing."
ins: Combine arugula, strawberries, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, almonds, feta cheese, and sea salt together in a bowl; toss until well combined.
